stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: INC000010114316
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: China-based APT10 (Menupass Team) is conducting a sustained espionage campaign against major corporations in the Nordic region. Evidence suggests this campaign is connected to global targeting of companies with relationships to Nordic victims. The threat actors continue to employ SOGU (aka PlugX, DestroyRAT) malware over recently identified communications infrastructure.
